Package com.peyrona.mingle.network.websocket

Class WebSocketServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.peyrona.mingle.lang.japi.ListenerWise<com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.network.INetServer.IListener>
      • com.peyrona.mingle.network.BaseServer

          • com.peyrona.mingle.network.websocket.WebSocketServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.network.INetServer
    public final class WebSocketServer
extends BaseServer4IP
    WebSocket server supporting both plain and SSL connections. This class is a concrete implementation of a Mingle network server that uses the WebSocket protocol, leveraging the Undertow library for handling the underlying connections.
    Author:
    Francisco Jos√© Morero Peyrona Official web site at: https://github.com/peyrona/mingle

        public WebSocketServer()

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.network.INetServer start​(java.lang.String sCfgAsJSON)
        Starts the WebSocket server with the specified configuration. The configuration is provided as a JSON string, which can include settings for the host, port, path, and SSL.
        Parameters:
        sCfgAsJSON - A JSON string containing the server configuration.
        Returns:
        The server instance.
        Throws:
        com.peyrona.mingle.lang.MingleException - if the server is already running or fails to start.

      • stop

        public com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.network.INetServer stop()
        Stops the WebSocket server gracefully. This method closes all active client connections and shuts down the underlying Undertow server.
        Returns:
        The server instance.

      • broadcast

        public com.peyrona.mingle.lang.interfaces.network.INetServer broadcast​(java.lang.String message)
        Broadcasts a message to all connected clients.
        Parameters:
        message - The message to be sent.
        Returns:
        The server instance.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the server is not running.

      • hasClients

        public boolean hasClients()
        Checks if the server has any active client connections.
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one connected client, false otherwise.

      • init

        protected boolean init​(java.lang.String sCfgAsJSON,
                       int nDefPort)
        Overrides:
        init in class BaseServer4IP
